summary: Documentary about legendary guitarist Richie Blackmore, who is best known for his work with rock bands Rainbow and Deep Purple.
cast: Ed Eales White|Ritchie Blackmore|Steve Lukather|Brian May|Joe Satriani|Gene Simmons|Steve Vai|Lars Ulrich|David Coverdale|Phil Collen|Ian Anderson|Mike Clemente|Malcolm Dome|Ian Gillan|Chris Welch|Ian Paice|Royal Philharmonic Orchestra|Jon Lord|Martin Birch|Roger Glover|Jim Ladd|Glenn V. Hughes III|Chris Charlesworth|Cozy Powell|Graham Bonnet|Joe Lynn Turner|Candice Night|Doogie White|Pat Regan|David Sutch
title: The Ritchie Blackmore Story
